meta.name: VoiceActivity
meta.description: Shows icons and info in popouts, the member list, and more when someone is in a voice channel.
meta.author: Neodymium

changelog.title: Added
items: Added a new option to display Mute/Deafen/Video status on member list icons (enabled by default).

changelog.title: Fixed
items: Fixed VoiceActivity section not displaying on user popouts.
